text: Kandi ingamiya (zitangwaho ibitambo) twazibashyiriyeho nk’imwe mu migenzo ya Allah mufitemo ibyiza byinshi (amafunguro, ibihembo ku munsi w’imperuka). Bityo, (igihe mugiye kuzibaga) mujye muzivugiraho izina rya Allah igihe ziziritse (zigiye kubagwa), maze nizigwa hasi (nyuma yo kuzibaga), mujye muzikuraho (inyama) muzirye, munaziheho abakene badasaba ndetse n’abasabirizi. Uko ni ko twategetse (ayo matungo) kubacira bugufi kugira ngo mushimire
